page.title: 09ECOLOGY - FOOTPATHS
page.content:
FOOTPATH 30/64 Gwndwnmawr to Cwm starts on Mynydd Llangyndeirne road near Gwndwnmawr, through fields, passing Berllandywell to end near Cwm. FOOTPATH 30/65 Caegwyllt to Ynysfach starts on Mynydd Llangyndeirne road through fields passing Caegwyllt and Llwynfilwr farms to meet Footpath 30/61. FOOTPATH 30/66 Blaenyfan to Tycam starts on B4309 road near Meinciau crossroads crossing fields and passing Blaenyfan and Cae'r Arglwyddess farms, ends at Tycam FOOTPATH 30/67 Kiln House to Llethr-Bach starts at B4309 road near Kiln House, along lane near Fan Quarry, through fields passing Llethr-Bach, ends near Llwynwermwd.
.
